title: No petrol, diesel vehicles in India: Gadkari vows to eliminate fuel cars
description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari aims to transform India into a green economy by eliminating over 36 crore petrol and diesel vehicles. With plans to reduce GST on hybrid vehicles and promote biofuels, he envisions using fuel import savings to benefit farmers and create jobs.
